_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
dn27:4.1+dn27:32.11^who_else_mentioned: Vāseṭṭha, Brahmā, King Pasenadi, Kosala, Gotama, Sakyans, Pasenadi, Sakyan, Māra, Buddha, Brahmā Sanaṅkumāra
before^dn27:4.1^where: Sāvatthī in the Eastern Monastery, in the stilt longhouse of Migāra's mother
where: Sāvatthī in the Eastern Monastery, in the stilt longhouse of Migāra's mother
